modules.title: Unlock International Defence and Dual-Use Potential
modules.content: Miltton connects organisations to global defence and dual-use opportunities, leveraging deep international networks and advanced technology expertise. Our hands-on approach helps clients succeed in rapidly evolving markets where civilian and military innovation intersect.

modules.title: Business-Focused Defence & Dual-Use Travel Programmes
modules.content: Miltton's exclusive study visits connect business leaders to the forefront of defence and dual-use innovation, from rapidly evolving drone ecosystem to high-level engagements in Washington, D.C. and Kyiv. Participants gain strategic insights and direct access to the key stakeholders.

programmes.title: Ukraine Defence & Drone Tech Study Visit
programmes.description: Immerse yourself in Ukraine's fast-evolving defence and drone technology ecosystem, where real-world battlefield needs drive rapid innovation and collaboration. Gain direct insight into priority capability gaps and opportunities for joint R&D, localisation, and investment. This visit offers unparalleled access to the world's most dynamic testing ground for military and dual-use drones.

programmes.title: Drone 360 Programme
programmes.description: Explore the latest developments in civilian and military drone applications, counter-drone technologies, and transatlantic market trends. Meet face-to-face with leading experts and decision-makers shaping drone innovation, regulation, and security planning. The programme provides exclusive access to key stakeholders across the U.S. and European defence sectors.

programmes.title: Washington Update
programmes.description: Participate in a focused programme covering security, the economy and trade, U.S. politics and elections, and geopolitics. Engage with influential figures, entities, and gain strategic insights into the latest developments at the heart of the U.S. capital. This visit is designed for leaders seeking to understand global power shifts and their impact on business.

modules.title: Frontline Nexus — Intelligence for Defence Dual‑Use Growth
modules.content: The defence sector is often viewed too narrowly, leaving much of the dual-use and cross-sector innovation potential untapped. Frontline Nexus is Miltton's advanced decision intelligence service, transforming open signals, research, and real-world activity into actionable growth pathways across defence and dual-use markets. Its powerful database benchmarks hundreds of thousands of companies to reveal the partners, professionals, investments, and opportunities that best fit your strategy.

modules.title: Miltton's Comprehensive Support for Defence and Dual-Use Growth
modules.content: Building on the insights and connections gained through Frontline Nexus and our exclusive study visits, Miltton delivers a comprehensive suite of services to drive success in the evolving defence and dual-use sector. Our expertise covers strategy, stakeholder engagement, technology adoption, and international market access. Key Miltton Services: • Strategic advisory for market entry, growth, and business model development • Stakeholder mapping and engagement across international defence ecosystems • Regulatory, market dynamics, and geopolitical analysis for defence and dual-use sectors • AI-driven strategy design and technology adoption support • Hands-on execution of concrete market-entry and expansion plans • Access to a specialist network spanning the Nordics, Baltics, U.S., Ukraine, and Brussels
